summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing shipping charges and services provided. The invoice indicates that Epstein has a past due balance and includes various charges for FedEx Express and Ground services, along with adjustments and discounts applied.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the primary account holder for the FedEx services detailed in the invoice, with multiple shipping charges listed under his name.

events.title: FedEx Invoice Issued
events.description: FedEx issued an invoice to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services rendered.

events.title: Past Due Notice
events.description: A notice was sent to Epstein indicating that his account was past due.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 4-299-66158 and it was issued on July 29, 2002.
The total amount due on the invoice is $259.78.
The invoice indicates that Epstein has a past due balance.
Multiple recipients are listed for packages sent from Epstein's address.
The invoice includes various shipping charges for FedEx Express and Ground services.
